page.title: 07MUSIC TEACHER
page.content:
{Mrs McArthur}is an 84 year old music teacher who teaches nearly 30 pupils for violin lessons and 1 for piano lessons. She teaches every day except Sunday and all day Saturday.
Her small orchestra meets every week and consists of all the pupils.It is called{"Strings and Things".}Annual concerts are held every summer and Christmas. The orchestra has also performed the{Toy Symphony,}by Haydn, in Kirkwall and has taken part in the Orkney folk festival.
There are{examinations}held every summer with an examiner coming from the south of England.It is cheaper to pay an examiner's expenses than to send all of the pupils to Kirkwall.
